00039 class BoundingBox
00040 {
00041 private:
00042         transf mTran;
00043         transf mTranInv;
00044 public:
00045         vec3 halfSize;
00046         //for debugging purposes
00047         mutable bool mMark;
00048         BoundingBox(const transf &t, const vec3 &v) : mTran(t), mTranInv(t.inverse()), 
00049                                                                                                   halfSize(v), mMark(false) {}
00050         BoundingBox(const BoundingBox &b) : mTran(b.getTran()), mTranInv(b.getTranInv()), 
00051                                                                                 halfSize(b.halfSize), mMark(b.mMark) {}
00052         BoundingBox() : mTran(), mTranInv(), halfSize(), mMark(false){}
00053         INLINE_RELEASE void applyTransform(const transf &t);
00054         void setTran(const transf &t) {
00055                 mTran = t;
00056                 mTranInv = mTran.inverse();
00057         }
00058         const transf& getTran() const {return mTran;}
00059         const transf& getTranInv() const {return mTranInv;}
00060 };
